content:
Hi All,

I have few questions regarding VhDir Resources mentioned in FHIR website. Can anyone please explain me the following points in detail.

1. What is the exact use of VhDir Resources.
2. In which scenario we will be using VhDir Resource Or Base Resource for eg Basic-Healthcareservice resource vs VhDir Healthcareservice.
3. Do we need to provide separate URL of web api for VhDir apart from our basic implementation of FHIR.
4. The searching techniques are similar or different in both the cases.
Thanks in advance.

Regards
Mahesh
